players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice's death on Night 1 means we have one mafioso among the three of us remaining. We need to be very careful with our vote today since we can't afford to eliminate the detective."
Diana: "I investigated Bob last night and discovered he's the mafioso. We need to vote him out immediately to win this game."

You: "Diana is clearly the mafioso trying to frame me! Think about it - if she was really the detective who found the mafioso, why would she reveal herself so openly? That's exactly what a mafioso would do to eliminate an innocent player."

Diana: "Charlie, I'm the detective and I know Bob is the mafioso. Bob is trying to create doubt, but think logically - if I were mafia, Alice would still be alive since mafia don't kill their own teammates. Bob killed Alice!"

Charlie: "Diana makes a compelling point - if she were mafia, Alice would still be alive since mafia don't kill teammates. Her detective claim with investigation results seems genuine. I'm voting Bob."

You: "Charlie, don't let Diana manipulate you! She's using circular logic - of course she'd claim to be detective after killing Alice. I'm the real detective and investigated Diana - she's the mafioso! Vote Diana!"

Bob was arrested
